reviews.review:
遊戲性 9.5/10
劇情 9/10
音樂 9.5/10
Elizabeth 100/10

之前在360玩過一代﹝現在才發現我打錯了=口=﹞，沒全破不過真的好玩，這款比較起來畫面亮好多，不會有一代的壓迫感，還有女版多啦A夢幫補血補子彈還能撿到錢，重點是還很耐看xD

戰鬥流暢性十足，異能跟武器連發都不會有Lag狀況，空軌複雜戰鬥時的變化，會越玩越High。

劇情比較科幻(時間線)，但是玩完絕對會忘不了，音樂方面就是經典老歌獨有的韻味。

最重要的是，破關以後解鎖的1999挑戰(血尿)模式以及根本等於一款20-30小時遊戲的DLC，不買真的會後悔!!!

2013的遊戲到2016還是打趴一堆FPS遊戲，絕對值得一玩。
ЭТО БОЖЕСТВЕННАЯ ИГРА ПОИГРАЙ САМ И ПОЙМЁШЬ
ШЕДЕВР!

Astoundingly good.  Very little bad about this game.  Graphics are quite fine.  Play action is very interactive and enjoyable (satisfying crunches and screams from your enemies as you drive them before you; and the wailing of their women).  Story line is particularly good - a really nice attempt to examine time/dimension travel and its consequences; with issues of racism, American triumphalism, baptism & the need for redemption, and the duty of a father to daughter (though I didn't get that daughter thing at first and was a bit shamefaced for thinking this was the love interest).  Also, the biggest and most unexpected jump scare I've had in a game in a long time - not saying where.  Highly recommend and replay is good too.

I have completed this game, and long story short...

IT'S AMAZING

If you don't know already this game is great.
Most people will tell you the story is amazing, and I DEFINITELY agree, but
that isn't the only thing interesting about this game.

Combat

They did an excellent job at making you mix guns vigors (and other things you get later in the game) together to make intense and quality combat.
You could be shooting crows at of your hands while firing your revolver at a poor soldier nearby.

Each vigor did seem slightly repetative but each still had a unique feel and you never feel like one is worse than the other.

The guns are simple, but that just means you wont spend time customizing them.
They don't have lots of different weapons but that means all of them are unique and special
(huge weapons like rocket launchers have less ammo but are more powerful)
Just like vigors, none of them feel more powerful than the other.
You could keep an assualt rifle over a minigun for various reasons(not saying the minigun is bad)

Your partner is never missed even though she doesn't fight,
since Elizebeth(I don't remember how to spell her name if I spelt it wrong)
isn't Lidia, and cant take on 3 trolls at once, she has to hide.
However, they have made a new system where she still helps you.
She is basically a dispenser for anything,
She will throw you ammo or health in combat, toss you a coin when your looking for loot, or even give you a gun when she finds one.(it's helpful because of the many trashbins or boxes in areas I dont want to look in)


The story


OH

MY

GOD

The story is good,
if this were even a book on steam I would still like it.
 you start off going into the city which people have probably told you is flying, and you can already get the feel of the place.
This must be a lovely place to stay, in the sky.
But then you have to do something that starts of the combat, and it shows you the truth.
Then it starts getting interesting as you start wondering about the place.
Eventually you find your partner, and there are lots of details about her that you will start thinking about, im not going to tell you though because i don't want to spoil it even though you see this 30 minutes into the game.
As you progress, you start realizing whats going on, the different factions, Elizebeths, well, *spoilers*and many other things.

And that ending.
I don't want to spoil the ending so much that I am just going to say it's GOOD in fact it's not good, it's GREAT, actually its the most plot twisty, shocking, mildly weird, amazing,
mind blowing, out of this world, unexpected, non cliche(abviously), sad, OH MY GOD, supercalifragilisticexpialidocious 
ending...
I have ever seen.

Extras
Theres this one couple you see over and over again in the game.
Every time you see them it just makes you smile.
They just don't make sense and it's actually part of the lore.
That moves us on to our next part.
The audio logs.
You would think "Oh its just someones voice to add progression."
That's what I thought too!
But the truth is.
Every person in the audio log has their own story, their own different type of voice acting, and it makes it interesting to hear each ones personality.
There are different series of audio logs, and each one tells a story about a character(including the couple)having a great story for each one.

And one last thing 
I only review games I think are good incase you still arent convinced.

thank you for reading this review all the way if you have(it's a pretty long review and everyone just reads the funny ones)

Seeing as this was my first Bioshock game(will play others when remastered releases) i really didnt expect to enjoy this game....This game is really good with a really good story, confusing at first but as time goes on you start putting pieces of the puzzle together...which unravels a very twisted and dark plot that nobody was really ready for which is all ill say without going into possible spoilers

all in all i wouldve loved to play this game upon release to enjoy it with everybody else, great game with a really good plot...

8/10
10\10.Лучшая сюжетная,одиночная игра,в которую я играл.

Bem, por onde começar...
O Bioshock Infinite é o terceiro jogo da triologia Bioshock.
O Bioshock Infinite desde que foi revelado na E3 de 2011 sofreu muitas alterações, sejam elas graficas, do mapa, da personagem Elizabeth e missoes. Se forem ver nada do trailer aparece no jogo "entregue as nossas mãos".
Agora falando um pouco do jogo em si. Bioshock é um FPS com uma pequena dose de RPG (As roupas para o personagem, dinheiro, vida, salts e maquinas de venda). É um jogo fast-paced, diferente dos outros bioshocks que eram mais lentos, porque neste jogo existem as Sky-Lines (Que para quem nao sabe sao caminhos aereos onde podes andar atraves do sky-hook) que facilitam a tua deslocação e ajudam te na batalha.
Bem, sobre a historia o que posso dizer é que, O Booker DeWitt (personagem que controlamos) era um apostador, que perdeu tudo, e para ganhar dinheiro virou investigador privado mas antes disto ele tinha passado pelo exercito no qual entrou aos 16 anos. Um dia ele foi contratado por um casal que lhe ofereceu um trabalho que era ir a uma cidade e trazer de la uma rapariga e em troca disso todas as dividas dele iriam ser apagadas. E depois da se inicio a historia que jogamos no Bioshock Infinite.
Em termos tecnicos, o jogo tem uns graficos excelentes como podem ver pelos trailers e imagens aqui na loja steam, claro que temos de ter em atenção que o jogo saiu em 2013. Tem tambem uma incrivel trilha sonora com musicas da epoca. Quando a gameplay é fast-paced.
A Elizabeth ao contrario do que todos pensam ela não é inutil nem te atrapalha nas batalhas, muito pelo contrario quando tas com pouca vida ela da te vida, quando tens poucos salts ela da te salts e quando nao tens munição ela dá te. Para alem de ela durante as batalhas estar sempre escondida e sempre a procura de recursos para te auxiliar na batalha (munição, vida e salts) e ela interage com o ambiente, as vezes sentando se numa cadeira ou sofá, fazendo comentarios a cerca do cenario, entre outras... Ela tambem te ajuda caso passes um item importante ela fica a olhar para ele e por vezes comenta algo. Para alem de as vezes ela encontrar dinheiro e te dar a ti.
O Song Bird o famoso substituto do Big Daddy, ele existe pelo mesmo motivo do big daddy que é proteger a sua little sister neste caso a Elizabeth. Porem ele aparece poucas vezes no jogo.

A cerca das dlcs, É RECOMENDADO jogar depois de acabar a historia de Bioshock Infinite.
As duas Dlcs sao situadas em rapture (apesar de terem pequenos trechos de paris), em um universo paralelo, onde booker é um investigador privado e elizabeth tem um trabalho para encontrar a menina adotada de Booker. (Booker e Elizabeth nao se conhecem neste universo).

O jogo foi avaliado em 9.4/10 pela critica.

Para mim, que ja joguei toda a triologia, foi o melhor jogo da minha vida. Tem tudo o que alguem pode pedir, uma historia boa, boa trilha sonora, personagens marcantes e um dos melhores finais de sempre. (Relembrando que isto é a minha opinião)

Totalmente Recomendado!

A minha avaliação: 10/10

Conclusión final:
Comer comida de la basura/suelo/entrañas de drogadicto/planta de plástico que adorna/del agua/de un niño/de la arena/del bolso de una señora/de un dispensador oxidado/de el canal de Magic Boss o de los videos en oculto de Destructor ciento ochenta es bueno.
Muy buen juego, algo enrredado al final la historia, pero no te aburriras, ahora a esperar la remasterizacion de este juego para volver a jugarlo con mejores graficos :D

A great game and reimagining of the first bioshock, also a classic game, the visuals and sound are some of the best I have ever experienced in a game, love the story, a little bit of a tear jerker towards the end. truly mind expanding in some of the concepts it brings forward with interdimensional game mechanics and plot points.
Love the main characters and your companion throughout the whole game, trying to think of a level I did not like, got stuck in one level but found the way out eventually. Other than that I had a solid experience the entire way through, dealing with some hard edged themes along the way. if you are reluctant to burn time in a game, give 15 or so hours of your life to this game its worth it, tempted to do it all over again. 

10/10

PROs
-Visuals are amazing and serve a purpose, everything is complementry to the rich story it tells 
-Sound is just as good, some musical comedy playing on the themes within as well, you wil know what I mean when you play it
-Story arguably one of, if not the best story in a video game.
-Themes are hard edged and takes itself serious enough to push into new teritory games often don't 

CONs
-Gameplay mechanics did not quite live up to the original preiview of the game 
-Did not expand on the multiplayer online experience, bioshock 2 ended up dying online, but was hoping they might make something better in the 3rd game

revisited in 2018 as part of a reward, still holds up IMO.

This game has one of the best stories that i have ever experienced in any game yet. The character development makes one attached to both of the main characters (especially Elizabeth). The combat is also very unique by integrating special abilities such as "salt" abilities into the combat. The ending has also got to be the biggest plot twist and best ending i have seen to a story. Left me speechless for quite some time. I dont see why anyone who doesnt own this game hasnt played it yet for it is a must have.

-----------9/10-------------

I have to admit, at first I was skeptical about Bioshock Infinite.  I am a massive fan of its predecessors but the small amount of information that I had heard about the third game in the series had me unsure of whether it would carry the legacy or be a brutal flop.  Finally, I gave this game a try and I was blown away by it.

Instead of making a return Rapture, Bioshock Infinite brings you to the flying city of Columbia.  Your character, Booker DeWitt has made his way to this city to find a girl who you have been hired to collect.  From very early on the atmosphere is built in such an amazing way that I can think of few other games that can compete with it.  The story is full of incredibly well-written plot twists, one that even made me stare at the screen in shock which is quite the accomplishment for a game.  Obviously, I want to avoid spoilers but I will whole-heartedly slam down my stamp of approval on the story from start to finish.

The gun play and vigors (the new plasmids) are very reminiscent of the earlier Bioshocks and not a whole lot has changed there.  It's still an enjoyable first-person shooter but these mechanics are nowhere near as mind-blowing as the story.  I did, however, find a good deal of enjoyment from a few of the new guns and vigors that were tossed into the game for us to have fun with.

In conclusion, there isn't a whole lot more that I can say about this great game without dropping any spoilers.  I had a great time with it and played it through fairly quickly; I had beaten it in around twelve hours and that includes the time I spent searching around the area for additional content to find.  Though short, it is most definitely worth picking up, especially on a sale, and I highly recommend it to all who enjoyed the first two Bioshock games.  You will not be disappointed.

This game is probably one of my favorite games to play. The immersive storyline and massive gameplay pull you in and never lets you go. As you progress into the game, your perception of the game changes and throws you for a wild spin. 

If you like mind-bending storyline
If you like mysticism and Pyschological thriller
This game is for you

Recuerdo que me odiaron por mi crítica anterior donde prefería "Bioshock 2" que a "Bioshock" (Es eso, o escribo jodidamente mal) Lo siento, en verdad lo siento, me deje guiar por mi corazoncito de Little sister lastimado.

_Es necesario jugar "Bioshock" antes de jugar Infinite_

Bioshock Infinite se merece totalmente un 10/10. Gráficos, mecánica, aunque diferente, sus frases ¡SUS FRASES! ¡LAS INCREÍBLES FRASES! Los personajes, la empatía, catarsis y total inmersión. Y obvio, no podía dejar de mencionar la parte dirty del asunto: A las chicas, Dewitt, papacito de cabello rubio/castaño y barbita poco cuidada (Lo siento, asi me gustan). A los chicos, Elizabeth, lo sé pillín, yo sé que le parabas tomando foto cuando se ponía a buscar ganzúas. 

Y por último, lo más importante, esa sensación de perdedor cuando te das cuenta que el juego te troleo de la forma más miserable. Estoy en 1912 en medio de una guerra civil, y de repente mi cabeza voló en mil pedacitos.


DLC's. Consta, como en "Bioshock 2" con un pack destinado a psicopatas +A (leáse mi crítica a BIoshock 2 para entender el chiste), y otro, en modo historia "Burial at sea" que vale la pena comprar definitivamente. 

Y muero por no poder spoilear o hablar demás asi que me voy corriendo de una vez.

*Apto para fans de la saga
*Apto para ti
*Apto para tu yo, de... spoileeeeeeeeeeer!

Pd. Me voy, no me pegues.

I don't know where to even begin with this game. It was so hauntingly beautiful, and so different from the first two games (albeit one not technically being apart of the franchise) that I was at first unsure of how well I would like this game. Starting out, I was mildly confused - this being said, I would recommend playing this game though at least three or four times before you can wrap your head around it. But this game has my heart, and my mind, and my soul. As you can see from the 50 some hours I've played it.. well worth spending your life on it.

It isnt quite as immersive as the first Bioshock due to the on-rails scenes and re-using the same locations, however that isn't even a consideration when compared to the rest of this PERFECT game!

[h1] [i]Pour commencer, je dois précisé que se qui sera décris si dessous et mon avis personnel , et qui ne s'applique pas a tout le monde, chacun doit faire sa propre expérience du jeu, je décris seulement quel a était mon point de vu sur se jeu et franchement le gros que j'en ai retenu, c'est que Bioshock infinite et JUSTE ENORME[/i] [/h1]

[u]-Points positifs :[/u]

*Le gameplay et génial !
*Plein de nouveaux Plasmides... Enfin je voulais dire Toniques !
*Le jeu et franchement beau ! (même en basse quelité !)
*J'adore les finishs et les exectutions... Vous serez juste en mode : DU SANGGGGGGG (Désolé pour nos amis Allemands au passage qui n'ont quazy aucun jeu gore ^^ )
*L'esprit de Bioshock et toujours là ! La découverte de la vérité !
*La fin et Juste MINDFUCK mais complêtement imprévisible !
*Le suspens et au rendez vous tout le temps, vous ne savez jamais se qui va se passer !
*Des choix ! Et oui , vous aurez des choix a faire ( Qui influenceront pas le jeu autant que ça je vous rassure ! )
*La nouvelle arme de Corps a Corps et juste trop trop trop génial !
*Liberté de mouvement (en combat) quaziment illimitée !
*Des Choses a trouvée même dans les recoins les plus improbable ! ( Se qui augmente pas mal la vie du jeu )
*Se jeu et un peut.. Comme... Une nouvelle a chute si je puis dire ! ( Vous ne vous attendez pas aux vérité et explications et autres fournis, vous serez a la ramasse et essayerais de comprendre a chaque vérité, car la précedente vous a mis en tord ! )
*Les slides sont enormes !
*Sauter de Maisons en maison graçe a votre arme de corps a corps !
*Combattez comme bon vous semble, utilisé les Pl...Toniques comme bon vous semble ou tabasser vos ennemis a mort ou alors transformez les en passoirs ! A VOUS DE VOIR !
*Environnements plutôt variés !


[u]-Points Négatifs ( Il en faut bien ^^' ):[/u]

-Un peu répétitif ! (Avance -> Objectif -> Vague D'ennemis -> Avance -> Vague D'ennemis -> Objectif -> ReVague D'ennemis) (Bien que cela n'influence pas trop le plaisir que vous avez a jouer a se jeu !
-PASSEZ AU POINTS SUIVANT SPOIL DROIT DEVANT ! [spoiler]Pas de Boss Malheureusement...[/spoiler]
-Le jeu et un peu facile en normal sauf vers la fin... ( Pour moi du moins )
-Malheursement la majorité des ennemis sont faiblard :( ...

[u]Résumé du jeu ( Début pour ne pas Spoil )[/u]

Vous Etes Booker Dewitt, votre mission, et de retrouvé une fille, pour vous aquitté de vos nombreuses dettes, vous êtes donc envoyé dans un phare, apres avoir traversé la mer en barque avec deux etranges personnages, mais quand vous arrivez personne de présent, si se n'est les cafrards (Non pas des Radcafard, j'ai dis des Cafards Contrairement aux Fallout, eux ne vont pas essayé de vous pompez le sang ! Bref repassont a Bioshock) et le dawa (Bordel) Présent un peut partout dans le phare , un merveilleuse endroit pour vivre ! Les tâches de sang ABSOLUMENT partout, font une belle déco.. Mais wait... Cet Homme sur la chaise n'est pas tres bien au poitn et une mauvaise odeur se degage, surement dûe au sac sur la tête au sang et aux lames, vous sortez donc prendre l'air au sommet du phare , vous vous eclatez avec trois cloches, et BimBadaBoom, la porte souvre une chaise apparait, et comme dans tout les bioshock (sauf le deux, a mon avis le big daddy en a rien a ciré de ta chaise ikea en velours  de sous qualité a 50€) , votre perso se dis : LOL MDR CE SERAIT MARRANT DE SE METTRE ASSIS DANS CETTE CHAISE CEHLOU QUI SORS DE NUL PART ! Et comme a notre habitude, on se met assis dedans, mais comme personne ne si attendait, la chaise vous bloque la capsule se ferme et vous criez comme la team rocket : Nous partont vers d'autre cieux !!!!! [i]*Raclement de Gorge*[/i] Vous perdez le flingue qu'on vous a donné, c'est dommage il etait sympa, c'est balot vous l'aviez reçu y a 5 minutes... et Puis voila vous atterissez, ( on pourrais limite laisser notre imagination nous faire : *Pim Bum* nous atterissons actuellement a l'aéroport de New York, la chaleur extèrieur et de 25° veuillez verifiez de n'avoir rien oublier a bord de l'appareil, merci d'avoir choisis air Dewitt pour ce vole, en esperant que vous passerez un bon sejours, a bientôt sur nos appareil) dans une ville qui vole, (non se n'est pas sanctuary (Borderlands 2)) vous voila a présent a Colombia ! Ville plus Joyeuse et Plus animé que Rapture ! et vous n'aurez pas le problême de ne pas pouvoir changer d'air, du a l'eau etant donnée que bah... Vous êtes dans le ciel ! Vous verez ! Les plages sont cools par contre niveau Sécurité c'est pas ça...

Bref Merci de m'avoir lu en esperant que je vous aurez etait utile ! et que mon humour vous aura fait un minimum sourire !
A plus Et bon jeu !
u brabu
Un juego que debe jugarse

I have to be honest and say that I didn't find the story in this game all that compelling.  The initial set up was really interesting and the ending certainly makes you think in a 'my head hurts' sort of way but for me it lost it's way in the middle. 

Gameplay wise there's a lot to like.  It looks stunning and although this is basicallly an FPS, it felt fresh and nothing like any other FPS I've ever played (I haven't played any of the previous Bioshock games though).  The combat system is slightly odd in that, if you die, you get revived by Elizabeth for a small fee and go right back into the battle where you left off so the only way you could not beat this game is if you ran out of money which, certainly in my case was just not going to happen (the exception to this is the last battle where I think you start from the beginning every time).

All in all, I enjoyed Bioshock Infinite but I doubt I'll play it again.

The devs really cleaned up the disaster that was the original game. Gameplay was solid, story was compelling (though the end was a little bleh), graphics & performance are great. I highly recommend this game over BS 1 and 2 because the devs addressed the annoying issue in the prior games where the player would be depleted of ammo and health, causing your gameplay to come to a grinding halt. Elizabeth is essentially a gameplay mechanic hotfix and gripping story element all in one package. Worth picking up, but not for $30.

WOW !!!

Ein krönender Abschluss der Bioshock Serie!

Zuerst dachte ich ja, was soll das mit den Luftschiffen, ich will wieder die beklemmende Atmospähre unter dem Meer spüren. Aber ich muss sagen, die Jungs haben das echt toll hinbekommen.

Man kommt also wieder in dieser vom Rest der Welt abgeschotteten schöne Welt Szenario an. Alles tutti.
Doch dann nach und nach fängt die Fassade an zu bröckeln, alles geht drunter und drüber, und am Ende geht alles den Bach runter. 
Und gerade wenn man denkt das Spiel ende in einem ganz normalen Dauergeballere gegen zig dicke Gegner am Stück , da zieht die Story noch einmal so richtig an und haut einem vom Hocker.
Die Kinnlade auf dem Boden hängend schaue ich mir den Abspann an, als ob ich gerade einen emotionalen Kinofilm gesehen hätte und genieße noch leicht geschockt und von der Story mitgerissen minutenlang die geniale Musik, obwohl da eigentlich nur Namen über den Bildschirm laufen.

Ich muss sagen, das Spiel begeistert wie schon die beiden ersten Teile von Anfang bis zum Ende.
Ein Meisterwerk der Erzählkunst, so wie es auch die Metro Serie geschafft hat.
Sollte man sich anfangs noch gefragt haben, wie das alles miteinander zusammenhängt, und warum man plötzlich in den Wolken herumhangeln soll, ja das wird einem am Ende des Spiels wirklich toll rübergebracht und aufgelöst.
Toll, einfach toll!

Nicht nur die Story ist eine Meisterleistung, nein auch die ganze Technik ist einfach nur super.
Grafik und Sound auf sehr hohem Niveau, auch wenn natürlich grafisch Crysis 3 und Battlefield 4 heute schon eine Schippe drauflegen.
Aber die Art und Weise, wie die Programmierer und Künstler die Spielwelt gestaltet und eingefangen haben, das ist wirklich genial.
Immer wieder bleibt man stehen und schaut sich die tolle Spielwelt an.
Passende Bilder werde ich in den kommenden Tagen noch posten.

Die Steuerung der Spielfigur, die Anzahl und Art der Waffen und Magie, die dazu passenden Verkaufsapparate als Upgradeshops etc., die Integration der Transportbahnen in der Luft, die interessanten Gegner und NPC's, das alles wirkt wirklich stimmig und es ergibt eine toll inszenierte Spielerfahrung mit allem drum und dran.

Der Schwierigkeitsgrad auf Mittel ist wirklich gut und gleichmäßig schwer/leicht umgesetzt, ich bin nur einige Male theoretisch gestorben. Und da wird man dann ein wenig zurückversetzt, von Elisabeth ein wenig geheilt, und dann geht es weiter. Die noch verbliebenden Gegner haben aber dann auch ein wenig Leben zurück bekommen.
Das ist alles sehr fair gestaltet, und trägt zum Spielspaß bei.

Leute mit Sammeltrieb und Abzeichenjäger bekommen auch alle Hand voll zu tun, mit einem Durchgang wird man sicher nicht alles auf einmal finden oder erreichen können, auch wenn man sich anstrengt.
Ich habe immer versucht viel abzugrasen, doch fehlten mir am Ende einige Tonbänder und auch die Sachen mit den Magiekomponenten habe ich nicht geschafft, da ich zuallererst das mit den Waffen versucht habe zu ergattern.
Es gibt etliche Schlösser zu knacken, für die man auch nach Lockpicks Ausschau halten muss.
Und es gibt ein paar Geheimverstecke, wo man z.B. Codebücher für finden muss.

Ach was soll ich noch alles schreiben? Jeder Shooter Fan sollte auf jeden Fall diese Serie gespielt haben. Mehr Story, mehr Spielspaß, mehr Gameplay, mehr Spielzeit als bei COD. 

Ich gebe dem Spiel sehr gute 9/10 Punkte !

Mit einer noch moderneren Engine mit mehr Texturdetails, Tesselation und paar mehr Effekten, etwas mehr von der tollen Musik auch während des Spiels, ohne unnötig doppelte Waffengestaltung beider Parteien, mit zwar abweichender Waffenwerte, aber dafür notwendiger doppelter Waffenupgrades am Automaten und somit Geldverschwendung, und etwas weniger Maprecycling wäre sicherlich noch ein klein wenig mehr drin gewesen.

So, jetzt aber Spielen ! Ich fange gleich morgen mit den beiden DLC an. Kann es kaum noch erwarten...
One of few games that had my jar dropped the whole last chapter - incredibly awesome scenery!

Absolutely fantastic game, it manages to one-up the original Bioshock games despite how good those were. The visuals are fantastic and performance is superb. The story is gripping and the gameplay is long, definitely worth your money, especially with the DLC expansions. The 1999 mode provides a challenging gameplay experience and should make it more fun for people looking for a tougher game. Game mechanics are solid and combat is usually quite fun. 

Very recommended, DLC is also a great addition to the game.

I'm bad at writing reviews so I'll keep it short:

I liked it.

EDIT: Get it with Burial At Sea DLCs as they change your perpective on Bioshock series completely.

One of the best single player FPS I have ever played.  Combat is difficult but balanced and include lots of interesting mechanics such as a standard shield/health system, upgradeable weapons and special abilities and a sidekick who can give you items during battle when you need them the most.  The boss fights are some of the most memorable I have played in recent history.  The story and setting are also amazing.  My only complaint is that it is a little too short.  11.5 hours for a single playthrough (excluding DLC) when I looked in every corner to complete all side quests is a little short.

[i]Не играл в предыдущие игры серии и не проходил дополнения на данную игру, прошёл 1 раз за 12,3 часа на высокой сложности[/i].
[h1]Я ещё не прошёл игру, а уже понял, что буду рекомендовать её к покупке. Она чудесна![/h1]
[list]
[*]В игре прекрасно выдержан стиль и атмосфера- окружение выглядит красочно даже на минималках (свет в этой игре просто шикарен).
[*]Помимо красочных локаций ([i]часто в стиле стимпанк[/i]) в игре прекрасная озвучка персонажей- голоса хорошо подобраны, нужные интонации соблюдены.
[*]Музыка нормальная- она просто есть, хорошо вписывается в происходящее, не режет ухо.
[*]Геймплейная часть состоит из аркадного шутера с прыжками по аэротрассам- путям, пронизывающим уровень, за которые можно зацепиться и носиться по ним с огромной скоростью. Оружия не так много, но оно разнообразное, присутствует его прокачка- за деньги покупаем бонус на увеличение урона, уменьшение отдачи и пр. Геймплей скрашивают "плазмиды" - напитки, открывающие возможность стрелять огненными шарами/ воронами/ электричеством/ создавать щит и пр. ([i]долго с этим баловаться не выйдет- соли, которые используются как топливо для плазмидов, быстро расходуются- приходится искать синие бутылочки. Кстати, плазмиды тоже можно улучшать![/i]). В некоторых моментах у нас есть выбор, что призвать- укрытие или турель, медикаменты или оружие, но во время игры приходится чередовать призыв одних/других объектов. В итоге получается микс из прыжков по аэротрассе со стрельбой, использованием плазмидов и призывом некоторых объектов. Если поискать, на уровнях можно найти специальные колбы со странной жидкостью, собирая которые можно получить увеличение максимума здоровья/щита/солей на выбор ([i]совет: выбирайте щит[/i]). Разнообразят игру шмотки, которые можно найти-надеть, сильно помогающие при игре, элементы интерактивного кино ([i]с ничего не значащими выборами, хех[/i]), элементы хоррора ([i]скример был неожиданным[/i]) и прочие приятные мелочи.
[*]Сюжет прекрасен:  персонажи харизматичные ([i]Элизабет ШИКАРНА[/i]), а неожиданный поворот действительно неожиданный.
[*]Приятно, что в игре хорошая оптимизация.
[/list]
[b]Итог: Bioshock Infinite- одна из лучших игр, в которые я играл. Добавляю в "любимые игры" и ставлю оценку "Отлично!" (4 из 4).[/b]

Pues sin duda alguna, una de las mejores historias que he jugado hasta ahora. Quedé fascinado con Elizabeth, sin duda enamorado, espera que chingados hablo? Venga a un lado el estar divagando. Es un juego muy completo, excelemtes gráficas y sobre todo gameplay. Lo único que encontre malo, es que el mando/control de xbox 360 no funciona bien el port de linux (no importa la distribución). Pero vale soy pc gamer así que no me molesto para nada pasarlo completo con keyboard/mouse ya que es un shooter excepcional. Un bravo para lo desarrolladores y todo el equipo detrás de este hermoso y chingon juego.
My second favorite game of all time. And absolutely amazing game with a cool story combined with amazing gamepaly. I've played 3 times on Xbox 360 and once on here. Amazing.
Just buy it!!
Very good graphics.
don't be a dimwit

前作から打って変わって空中都市コロンビアが舞台のFPS
今作はストーリー的には連続性がほぼ無いので
前作をプレイしていなくとも問題は無い。

歴代のBioshockと同様にストーリーは非常に凝っており楽しめる内容であるが
そのストーリを追うのに手間が掛かるのが難点。
様々な場所に音声ログが設置されており、それが前作よりも高低差のある広くなったマップの影響か
メインルートから離れた場所にあったりと見つけ辛く、ゲームのテンポを悪化させている。
またキネスコープも一々見るのが億劫な場合も多い。
（日本語吹き替えが良く出来ているので尚のこと残念）

前作の廃墟同然のラプチャーと違い、infiniteではまだ人々が生活を送っており
それらの会話や生活感を感じさせる演出があるが一発発砲するだけで、敵の警備隊だらけになり一般人は消え去る。
敵を倒したあとは、全く無人の状況になってしまい、上記のログ回収を始めるとゲームの作業感を強く感じさせられてしまい
これならまだ廃墟を探索している前作のほうが潔い気がしてしまう。

戦闘においては、スカイラインでの移動を強いられる状況が後半多くなってくるが
無駄に広くなった戦闘エリアを縦横無尽に飛び回り立体的な戦闘が初回プレイからできるわけなく
かといって習熟したくなるほど戦闘に爽快感は無い。

爽快感でいえば、敵が前作のような怪物化した狂人ではなく、普通の人間であるので
バスバス殺していくのはなんというか多少戸惑いがある。
（ストーリー的に主人公が、殺し屋、戦闘狂扱いされている点はあるが）

武装の保持数も２つに限定されたのに全ての武装にグレードアップがあり
次のエリアで改めて入手できるか不明な状況では気軽なアップグレードも忌避される。

総括的に言うと、色々と残念な点もあるがbioshock自体が戦闘やギミックを次点に置いて
ストーリーで魅せるゲームだとするならば、Infiniteはそれらの範疇を越えるものではないので
前作をプレイしている人ならば上記の欠点は容易に目をつぶることは出来ると思う。

BioShock Infinite unterscheidet sich zu seinen Vorgängern durch die diesmal gar nicht so düstere Atmosphäre, aufgehellt durch Elizabeth, die einen durch das Spiel begleitet und für eine lockere Stimmung sorgt. Gameplay-technisch wird hier nah an der Perfektion gekratzt: Hübsches und angenehm laufendes Spiel mit fast unmerkbaren Ladezeiten, und viel inhaltliche Abwechslung durch verschiedene Kräfte, Waffen, Gegner und lauter Zeug zum Sammeln.
Das Highlight ist jedoch die Story, welche das Spiel durchgehend untermalt, recht interessant aufgebaut ist, und zum Ende noch einmal eine sehr gute, überraschende Wendung beinhaltet.
9/10. Muss man gespielt haben.
